recommendations: Chaim Bendelac
Vice President, Systems Solution Management at SAP Research
January 14, 2012, Chaim reported directly to Ike

Ike brings a broad intuition to how problems need to be solved. His perspective, based on his deep industry experience and academic exposure, provide Ike with a uniquely authoritative and intellectually persuasive way of creating and explaining a technological vision. He connects the practical and the theoretical, research and up-to-date technologies, history and a view of the future, into wonderful moments of insight.Ike has the authoritative ability to gather a top-quality team of researchers and senior engineers in order to turn such visions into reality. His warm relationships and talent for making new connections and friendships invariably create a deep impact and build strongly cohesive teams. Ike constantly challenges his teams to stretch the state of the art and leap forward, while taking a practical interest in every aspect of the project, and is always available for prime advice.All who know him respect, esteem and admire Ike for his accomplishments, his intellect, curiosity and interest in science, his sense of history, his love of teaching and story-telling, but most of all, his deeply human sharing and caring.

Juli Mallett
Software Developer and Episcopal Priest
October 29, 2007, Ike was senior to Juli but didn’t manage directly

Ike is a clever technologist and an engaging leader with a knack for driving people to be inventive and to champion new ideas.  He is also a leader who isn't hesitant to ask for and listen to criticism and who can build consensus across groups to move a company forward.

Oliver Bussmann
Global C-Level Executive | Board Director | Information Technology | Banking, Insurance & Asset Management
March 22, 2013, Ike worked with Oliver in different groups

Oliver and I started working together soon after he joined SAP.  I saw my job as promoting innovation at SAP, and felt his organization was often impeding innovation.  He fixed it.  Together we worked on several programs.  He broke down walls when necessary, understood that we jointly had a mission to improve various aspects of our own internal operations.  We were highly successful.  I thoroughly enjoyed working with him, and would certainly do so again if the opportunity presented itself.

Uwe Herold
Corporate Director Information Technology
August 10, 2009, Ike worked with Uwe in different groups

Uwe was CIO at SAP.  In this role he had complete responsibility for IT for a company that had about 50,000 employees.I had the good fortune to work with him not only in his capacity as CIO, but we had occasion to intensively work together in a small group over a six month period on a special project as part of our course of study at Insead (Fountainbleu).  I thoroughly enjoyed this process, and would work with him in a heartbeat.  I found him to be insightful, thoughtful, highly cooperative, and highly "teamwork oriented".  He was always well prepared.  He also could be relied on to have the ability to think "out of the box".  I highly recommend him.

summary: System software architecture, programming language design, optimizing compiler implementations, operating system design and implementation, distributed system implementation, personal computers, parallel processing, networking, software development for avionics applications.Ph.D. in Computer Science, Stony BrookAcademic experience - UC Santa Cruz, MIT, Stanford, UC Berkeley, Boston U.TidalScale - Founder and CEOSAP - Executive Vice President and Chief ScientistFiretide (wireless mesh networking) - Founder, Chairman, EVP, CTOInfoGear Tech. (iPhone, Internet Appliances and servers) - acquired by Cisco Apple Computer (Macintosh System Software, Dylan, Common Lisp)Encore Computer: (parallel processing)Visual Technology: (PC's)Digital Equipment Corp.: (VAX, Bliss, Tools, Ada)SofTech: (avionics)Specialties: Technology and business development, researcher, and entrepreneur. Have served on numerous boards.
